tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE resource_optimization (
    optimization_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id UUID,
    date DATE,
    optimization_category VARCHAR,
    optimization_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumptionData (
    site_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_value FLOAT,
    CONSTRAINT pk_energy_consumption PRIMARY KEY (site_id, timestamp)
)

CREATE TABLE SiteInformation (
    site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    owner VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ResourceUsage (
    site_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    resource_type VARCHAR(50),
    resource_value FLOAT,
    CONSTRAINT pk_resource_usage PRIMARY KEY (site_id, timestamp, resource_type)
)

CREATE TABLE OptimizationResults (
    site_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    optimization_metric VARCHAR(50),
    optimization_value FLOAT,
    CONSTRAINT pk_optimization_results PRIMARY KEY (site_id, timestamp, optimization_metric)
)
CREATE TABLE site ( site_id INT PRIMARY KEY, site_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE energy_meter ( meter_id INT PRIMARY KEY, site_id INT NOT NULL, meter_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, installation_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES site(site_id) ON DELETE CASCADE);

CREATE TABLE energy_reading ( reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY, meter_id INT NOT NULL, reading_date DATE NOT NULL, energy_value DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES energy_meter(meter_id) ON DELETE CASCADE);

CREATE TABLE energy_threshold ( threshold_id INT PRIMARY KEY, site_id INT NOT NULL, threshold DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, threshold_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES site(site_id) ON DELETE CASCADE);

CREATE TABLE energy_analysis ( analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY, site_id INT NOT NULL, analysis_date DATE NOT NULL, optimization_strategy VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, result_summary TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES site(site_id) ON DELETE CASCADE);
